summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Kilbourne Street, in the City of Seattle from 1st Avenue Northwest to Ashworth Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon , together with wooden cross walks, gutters and cross walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, all in accordance with Resolution No. 808 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
